location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, encloses a receipt (not included) from the Commander of the Honourable Company cruiser, the Nautilus, along with the first of exchange (also not included) for the advance made to the Commander.
